inputFieldDirectoryDescription: Location of input files like AAAA.HRC
outputGltfDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output files like aaaa.hrc.gltf, aaaa.hrc.bin
texturesDirectoryDescription: Location of texture files like aabb.png, relative to outputGltfDirectory
inputFLevelDirectoryDescription: Location of unpacked flevel files like maplist, md1stin, flevel.siz, c_eye2.tex
outputFLevelDirectoryDescription: Where the translator will put output files like maplist.json, md1stin.json
